name: The Madman's Sky City Builder
description:
Only a madman would rely on a dice during city planning.

You are a renowned architect, who takes up the challange and design a beautiful city near the Shrine Olympus - using only a dice with roads, tiles and zones and your own, wicked imagination.

Thanks to its endless nature, the game offers multitude of gameplay possibilities. Relaxing evening with City Builder? The most-efficient city challenge?  Random madness? Play as you choose!

Game made for  GMTK Game Jam 2020 - "Roll of the Dice"

Right Mouse Button - Drag Camera

Left Mouse Button - Roll the dice, then place a tile (tiles must meet sideways!) + Select a new tile

A, D - Rotate tiles

EcStatic - ReddBear & JayExec
